value: A network of who-trusts-whom relationships among users of the Bitcoin OTC platform. Each directed edge (i,j,w) represents the rating of user j by user i, in which i assigns j a weight w on a scale of -10 (total distrust) to +10 (total trust) in steps of 1.
['S. Kumar, F. Spezzano, V.S. Subrahmanian, and C. Faloutsos, \Edge weight prediction in weighted signed networks.\" IEEE 16th International Conference on Data Mining (ICDM)
